page.title: 06Working Life
page.content: At 7.00am dad gets up to get ready for work.He works at S.C.M which used to be Laportes making pigments for paints. At 7.30am he sets off to work on an 8 hour shift by car or motor cycle.When he goes by car he has a security number on a sticker on the windscreen.When he gets into the laboratory he puts his overalls on has a cup of tea then he weighs all the chemicals.He breaks for lunch about 11.50am and he eats his lunch in the cafeteria.His favourite is curry,fried egg and mango chutney.Afterwards he goes back to work.When he is in the laboratory he weighs the chemicals again.His job also includes making a chemical analysis and physical testing of pigment.When it is time to handover the job he gives all the notes to the other person so he can carry on the job.Altogether he likes his job.
